message.body: Martha, its mark from Minnesota. I dunno what you're doing during pre fringe times, but if yr free wanna hit up happy hour tomorrow somewhere?
Mark from Minnesota! I've been meaning to get in touch to plan a meet-up. Yes and yes please. I have a couple rehearsals but it shouldnt be an issue. When and where?
Well, I spend most of my time in south Philly but I have a rehearsal in fishtown too - so either area really
Hmmmm... Well loco pez has probably my favorite happy hour because of nachos... DO YOU LIKE NACHOS??
This is a question that is so SILLY. What time?? I think I'll be done around 4

Ha ha cool let's say five, because that's when it opens and that is usually when I arrive because I LOVE NACHOS. Feel free to invite any compatriots, collaborators, etc, as well! Looking forward to it
The Crazy Fish and their 5oclocks. That sounds great and I will invite the who's who as should you.
